description: 1-minute demo: AI-powered voice transcription to CRM with automatic data extraction, record updates, and follow-up creation
trigger_phrases: Transcribe my sales call notes and update the CRM with the key information.

persona.name: Marcus Williams
persona.title: Account Executive
persona.context: Managing 40 active opportunities, spending 2 hours daily on CRM updates, seeking to automate admin work

agents_utilized.description: Transcribes voice recordings to text with speaker identification
Extracts key business entities from conversation text
Matches extracted entities to CRM records
Creates follow-up tasks and action items from conversations
Applies updates to CRM records with validation

conversation_flow.user_message: Transcribe my sales call notes and update the CRM with the key information.
conversation_flow.agent_response:
I've transcribed your 32-minute call and extracted the key information.

**Transcription Complete:**

| Detail | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Call duration | 32 minutes |
| Participants | You, Jennifer Walsh (CTO), David Park (VP Ops) |
| Company | TechForward Industries |
| Transcript accuracy | 97% |

**Key Entities Extracted:**

| Entity Type | Extracted |
|-------------|----------|
| Company | TechForward Industries |
| Contacts | Jennifer Walsh (CTO), David Park (VP Ops) |
| Budget | $150K-180K discussed |
| Timeline | "Decision by end of quarter" |
| Competitors | "Also looking at Competitor X" |

**Key Topics Discussed:**
1. Current system integration challenges
2. Security requirements (SOC 2 required)
3. Implementation timeline concerns
4. Budget approval process

**Buying Signals Detected:**
- "We need to make a decision soon"
- "This looks like it could work"
- Asked about implementation support

**Concerns Raised:**
- "How long does implementation take?"
- "Need IT signoff on security"

Source: [Voice Transcription + Entity Extraction]
Agents: VoiceTranscriptionAgent, EntityExtractionAgent

Match to CRM records and show updates?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, match to CRM and show me what will be updated
conversation_flow.agent_response:
CRM matching complete. Records found with updates ready to apply.

**CRM Records Matched:**

| Record Type | Name | Status |
|-------------|------|--------|
| Account | TechForward Industries | Existing |
| Contact | Jennifer Walsh | Existing |
| Contact | David Park | New (add) |
| Opportunity | TechForward - Enterprise | Existing |

**Opportunity Updates:**

| Field | Current | Extracted | Action |
|-------|---------|-----------|--------|
| Amount | $100,000 | $150,000-$180,000 | Update to $165K |
| Close Date | Dec 15 | "End of quarter" | Confirm (matches) |
| Stage | Discovery | Demo Given | Update |
| Competitors | (blank) | Competitor X | Add |
| Next Step | (blank) | Security review | Add |

**New Contact to Add - David Park:**

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| Name | David Park |
| Title | VP Operations |
| Role | Technical Evaluator |
| Email | (not captured - to research) |

**Account Updates:**
- Existing: No changes needed
- All company info matches

**Confidence Level:** 94% (high entity match quality)

Source: [CRM + Entity Matching]
Agents: CRMMatchingAgent, EntityExtractionAgent

Extract deal intelligence and action items?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, what deal intelligence did you capture?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Deal intelligence extracted with buying signals, objections, and competitive insights.

**Deal Intelligence Summary:**

**Buying Signals (Positive):**

| Signal | Quote | Strength |
|--------|-------|----------|
| Timeline urgency | "Need to decide this quarter" | Strong |
| Feature interest | "The integration looks exactly right" | Strong |
| Implementation ask | "How quickly can you deploy?" | Medium |
| Budget discussion | Willingly discussed $150-180K | Medium |

**Objections/Concerns:**

| Concern | Quote | Required Action |
|---------|-------|----------------|
| Security | "IT needs SOC 2 cert" | Send compliance docs |
| Timeline | "6 weeks feels tight" | Propose phased rollout |
| Approval | "CFO signs off on this level" | Request CFO meeting |

**Competitive Intelligence:**

| Insight | Detail |
|---------|--------|
| Competitor | Competitor X (also evaluating) |
| Status | "Saw their demo last week" |
| Concern | "They're cheaper but less capable" |
| Opportunity | Differentiate on integration |

**Deal Stage Recommendation:**
- Current: Discovery
- Recommended: Proposal/Price Quote
- Rationale: Budget discussed, decision timeline set

**Win Probability:** 45% â†’ 60% (based on signals)

Source: [Deal Intelligence Models]
Agents: DealIntelligenceAgent, EntityExtractionAgent

Generate action items and tasks?

Action items extracted and tasks generated for your follow-up.

**Explicit Commitments Made:**

| You Promised | To Whom | Quote |
|--------------|---------|-------|
| SOC 2 certification | Jennifer | "I'll send that today" |
| Implementation timeline | David | "Get you a detailed plan" |
| Pricing proposal | Jennifer | "Have it by Friday" |
| Reference customer | David | "Connect you with similar company" |

**Tasks Created:**

| Task | Due | Priority | Assigned |
|------|-----|----------|----------|
| Send SOC 2 documentation | Today | High | You |
| Create implementation timeline | Tomorrow | High | You |
| Prepare pricing proposal | Friday | High | You |
| Request reference intro | Tomorrow | Medium | You |
| Schedule CFO meeting | Next week | High | You |

**Calendar Items:**

| Event | Proposed Date | Attendees |
|-------|---------------|----------|
| Proposal review call | Next Tuesday | Jennifer, David |
| CFO introduction | TBD | CFO (to identify) |

**Email Draft Ready:**
- Follow-up email with SOC 2 docs
- Implementation timeline request to Solutions team
- Reference customer request to CS team

**Reminder Set:** Proposal due Friday (3 days)

Source: [Task Generation + Calendar]
Agents: TaskGenerationAgent, DealIntelligenceAgent

Apply all CRM updates?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, update the CRM with everything
conversation_flow.agent_response:
All CRM updates applied successfully.

**Updates Applied:**

**Opportunity - TechForward Enterprise:**

| Field | Before | After | Status |
|-------|--------|-------|--------|
| Amount | $100,000 | $165,000 | Updated |
| Stage | Discovery | Proposal | Updated |
| Close Date | Dec 15 | Dec 31 | Confirmed |
| Competitors | (blank) | Competitor X | Added |
| Next Steps | (blank) | Security review, proposal | Added |

**Contacts:**

| Contact | Action | Status |
|---------|--------|--------|
| Jennifer Walsh | Role updated | Complete |
| David Park | Created new | Complete |

**Call Log Created:**
- Date/time: Today, 32 minutes
- Type: Demo/Discovery
- Attendees: Jennifer Walsh, David Park
- Summary: Auto-generated from transcript
- Key points: Budget, timeline, competition

**Tasks in Salesforce:**
- 5 tasks created with due dates
- Linked to opportunity record
- Reminders set

**Activity History:**
- Full transcript attached to account
- Searchable for future reference

**Audit Trail:** All changes logged with source attribution.

Source: [CRM API + Data Validation]
Agents: CRMUpdateAgent, TaskGenerationAgent

Generate session summary?

Voice-to-CRM session complete. Here's your time savings summary.

**Session Summary:**

| Activity | Completed |
|----------|----------|
| Call transcribed | 32 minutes of audio |
| Entities extracted | 12 key data points |
| CRM records matched | 4 (1 new contact created) |
| Deal intelligence | Signals, objections, competitive |
| Updates applied | 8 field updates |
| Tasks created | 5 follow-up items |

**CRM Updates Summary:**

| Record | Changes |
|--------|--------|
| Opportunity | Amount, stage, competitors, next steps |
| Contact (new) | David Park - VP Operations |
| Call log | Full activity record |
| Tasks | 5 items with due dates |

**Deal Impact:**

| Metric | Before | After |
|--------|--------|-------|
| Deal amount | $100K | $165K |
| Stage | Discovery | Proposal |
| Win probability | 45% | 60% |
| Decision makers | 1 | 2 |

**Time Saved:**

| Traditional | With AI | Savings |
|-------------|---------|--------|
| Manual CRM update | 25 min | 2 min | 23 min |
| Task creation | 10 min | 0 min | 10 min |
| Note taking | 15 min | 0 min | 15 min |
| **Total** | **50 min** | **2 min** | **48 min** |

Source: [All Voice Processing Systems]
Agents: VoiceSummaryAgent (orchestrating all agents)

Your Voice-to-CRM session transcribed a 32-minute call, extracted 12 data points, updated 8 CRM fields, created 5 tasks, and saved you 48 minutes of admin work.

design_principles.visual_elements: 1 status indicator OR 1 table per response

business_value.problem: 2 hours daily on CRM updates, missed data capture, inconsistent records, admin burden on sales reps
business_value.solution: AI-powered voice-to-CRM with automatic transcription, entity extraction, and intelligent record updates
business_value.roi: 48 minutes saved per call, 97% transcription accuracy, automatic deal intelligence capture
business_value.performance: Real-time transcription, entity extraction, CRM matching, task creation, all in one workflow
